xwikidoc.content: ## Blog #set($blogClassname = 'Blog.BlogClass') #set($blogTemplate = 'Blog.BlogTemplate') #set($blogSheet = 'Blog.BlogSheet') ## Blog entries #set($blogPostClassname = 'Blog.BlogPostClass') #set($blogPostTemplate = 'Blog.BlogPostTemplate') #set($oldArticleClassname = 'XWiki.ArticleClass') ## Categories #set($blogCategoryClassname = 'Blog.CategoryClass') #set($blogCategoryTemplate = 'Blog.CategoryTemplate') #set($oldBlogCategoryClassname = 'Blog.Categories') #set($defaultCategoryParent = 'Blog.Categories') ## Style #set($blogStyleDocumentName = 'Blog.BlogStyle') #set($blogStyleDocument = $xwiki.getDocument($blogStyleDocumentName)) ## Clientside scripts #set($blogScriptsDocumentName = 'Blog.BlogScripts') #set($blogPublisher = $xwiki.getDocument('Blog.Publisher')) ## Misc #set($thisURL = $doc.getURL($context.action, $request.queryString)) ## ## ## #** * Displays an image, taken from the blog style document. * * @param attachmentName The name of the attachment to use. * @param alt The alternate text that should be displayed when images are not viewable. *# #macro(toolImage $attachmentName $alt) #end
